ModMetaData.name: EPOE: Rebalanced
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description:
Current Version: v1.2

Extensively rebalances items from EPOE:
* Most recipes and market values have been re-factored
* Any part above 'Basic' tier also needs the intellectual skill to be crafted
* All appropriate parts use the part efficiency model as opposed to capacity offsets
* Various parts themselves (e.g. power arms) have been re-balanced too
* Top-end parts (i.e. power arms, spines, exoskeletons) all need their own researches
* Workbench building is less material and more component intensive
* Raiders have higher prosthetic budgets
